item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 15, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:

20. Court tells EPA to consider fluoride risk (29 points | 23 comments)

26. Skip Hash: A fast ordered map via software transactional memory (24 points | 1 comment)

29. Cofounder Mode: My tactical guide to finding a cofounder (21 points | discuss)
